line_1: And so should prove to all posterity.
line_2: Why then immediately it did decree,

line_1: And so should prove to all posterity.
line_2: That unto man she should a blessing be,
Great Boiroimke! look down and see

line_1: Times future long, and late Posterity.
line_2: I'm young indeed, and might expect to see

line_1: Their Names in Folio to Posterity.
line_2: And doth commit with so much Industry,

line_1: But live with Fame to late Posterity:
line_2: Altho' his body in the Tomb must lie,

line_1: But live with Fame to late Posterity:
line_2: Yet Powlett's honour'd Name shall never die,

line_1: The just Despair of long Posterity,
line_2: The Piece which unaccomplish'd was by thee,

line_1: The just Despair of long Posterity,
line_2: By her may with advantage finisht be.
